caption.p: The effect of extracts of P. curatellifolia on haemolysis of sheep erythrocytes. (a) DCM: methanol extract, (b) water extract, and (c) hexane extract. The erythrocyte suspension was incubated with an equal volume of test sample extracts; A, B, and C dissolved in PBS, at varying concentrations from 0.625 to 5 mg/ml at 37°C.
